channel.title: Homes on Networked Cyber-Physical Systems Lab - National Taiwan Normal University - Computer Science and Information Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Networked Cyber-Physical Systems Lab - National Taiwan Normal University - Computer Science and Information Engineering

item.description: ”…他必像樹栽於水旁，在河邊扎根，炎熱來到，並不懼怕，葉子仍必青翠，在乾旱之年毫無掛慮，而且結果不止。” - 耶利米書 17:8 Cyber-Physical Systems (CPS) highlight a sensible integration of natural and computing, for the serving of this generation, and for the appreciation of the nature. 網宇實體系統、又名虛實整合系統、在情理內有效整合物理與資訊工程，為社會服務，並一窺自然的奧妙。 News [Recruiting] Welcome to join our team. [Paper] Chao Wang, Christopher Gill, Chenyang Lu. “Adaptive Data Replication in Real-Time Relibable Edge Computing for Internet of Things”, accepted for publication at IoTDI 2020. [Course] 108-2 開課 “CSC9006: Real-Time Systems 即時系統” and “CSU0007: Basic Electronics 基礎電子學”.

item.title: Professional Services
item.description: Guest Lecturer for Graduate/Undergraduate Course CSE 521, Wireless Sensor Networks, 2018 CSE 520, Real-Time Systems, 2017 CSE 473, Introduction to Computer Networks, 2013 Teaching Assistant for Graduate/Undergraduate Course CSE 520, Real-Time Systems, 2015-2016 CSE 473, Introduction to Computer Networks, 2013 Reviewer for International Research Journal and Conference Real-Time Systems: The International Journal of Time-Critical Computing Systems, 2017-2018 Journal of Systems Architecture: Embedded Software Design, 2018 IEEE Real-Time Systems Symposium (RTSS), IoT track, 2017 Organizer for International Research Conference
